category: Member City/Provincial Sports Association Regulations/Article 26 (Acting of President)
contents: Article 26 (Acting on behalf of the Chairman) ① When the Chairman is unable to perform his duties due to an accident, the Chairman shall perform his duties in the order determined by the Chairman when electing the Vice-Chairman, or if there is no such order, the seniority among the Vice-Chairmen shall act on his behalf, and if there is no Vice-President. Directors perform their duties in order of seniority. Revised 2017. 3. 23., 2020. 2. 11., 2021. 2. 4., 2021. 10. 6. [Title revised 2021. 10. 6.] ② In the event of a vacancy in the chairmanship, pursuant to paragraph 1 A person performs duties with the approval of the Sports Council, and if the remaining term from the date of vacancy is more than one year, the president must be elected within 60 days, and this does not apply if the term is less than one year. Revised on May 15, 2017, February 11, 2020, and May 10, 2022. [Moved from Paragraph 3, previous Paragraph 2 deleted on March 23, 2017] ③ The Acting Chairman shall perform ordinary administrative duties. , affairs outside the scope of the status quo, such as policy changes or personnel transfers, cannot be handled, but if it is an urgent matter, it can be handled by resolution of the board of directors. Revised 2020. 2. 11., 2021. 10. 6. [Moved from paragraph 5, previous paragraph 4 deleted March 23, 2017]
